POWERED by FUSION

An individual post follows.

Updated RSS

Taking a cue from Adam Rice, I’m offering an RSS 2.0 feed at http://www.al3x.net/index.xml. The current RSS 1.0 feed that most of you are subscribed to will continue to exist, but if you like the latest and greatest you’ll wanna move your news readers to the new feed. What’s up with RSS? Mark Pilgrim has a good, if technical, overview at O’Reilly’s XML.com.

—Mar 21, 2003
